alert.note: Alert for Coastal Onslow; East Carteret; Inland Onslow; Jones; Southern Craven; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 9:22PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Jones, southeastern Craven, northern Onslow and Carteret Counties through 1015 PM EDT... At 922 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Phillips Crossroads to near Atlantic. Movement was south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, New Bern, Havelock, Morehead City, Newport, Harkers Island, Pumpkin Center, Piney Green, New River Station, Half Moon, Camp Lejeune Center, Stella, Swansboro, Phillips Crossroads, Hubert, South River, Cape Carteret, North River, Richlands and Davis. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Onslow; East Carteret; Inland Onslow; Jones; Southern Craven; West Carteret
